exam.question: There are many who believe that the use of force ______ political ends can never be justified.

answer.explain: in pursuit of： 为了…。句意： 很多人以为使用武力达到政治目的永远都是不合理的。in search of： 寻找…； in view of： 考虑到…； in light of： 根据。
